{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.09901v1", "title": "On Geometric triangulations of double twist knots", "summary": "In this paper we construct two different explicit triangulations of the
family of double twist knots $K(p,q)$ using methods of triangulating Dehn
fillings, with layered solid tori and their double covers. One construction
yields the canonical triangulation, and one yields a triangulation that we
conjecture is minimal. We prove that both are geometric, meaning they are built
of positively oriented convex hyperbolic tetrahedra. We use the conjecturally
minimal triangulation to present eight equations cutting out the A-polynomial
of these knots.", "main_category": "math.GT", "categories": "math.GT", "published": "2025-04-14T05:50:29Z"}
